text: Fiji Water when we purchased Fiji Water
about uh three or four years
ago they had the square bottle they had
different packaging different graphics
on the on the packaging and their uh
unique selling proposition if you will
their slogan was a taste of paradise
but when I became involved in that water
business when we made the purchase and
it was up to me to review the marketing
see what I wanted to keep and what I
wanted to
change I did a lot of research in the
Water Business and I found out that 55%
of the water out there is actually from
the tap the danis and aquaf of the world
are tap water from the Municipal Water
System that are then purified and put in
a bottle and then you have spring water
like Evon and Waters like that that that
are almost on the surface you know they
come from an underground spring but they
on the surface and then we had this
water that we were selling that came
from an underground aquifer the water
fell as rain 200 years ago and went
through this uh volcanic rock and picked
up silica and the electrolytes and the
fluoride and so forth and was protected
by this volcanic rock and the only way
to get to the water was to put a bore
hole through and have the water come
through hermetically sealed
pipes and so our unique selling
proposition our personality became
untouched until you drank it because
that water's been untouched for all
these years and that was really set us
apart from a taste of paradise you could
say about any water that came from any
remote area but untouched until you
drink it we're probably the only people
in the world that can say that
well Palm certainly has a personality
that little bottle shaped like me you
may have
noticed um we make that bottle the
person so you relate to that bottle now
um the thing about Palm is that it's
backed with all this peer-reviewed
science it really is Health in a bottle
it's not just a juice it's it's full of
polyphenol antioxidants it's great for
your circulation it's good for men to
word off prostate cancer it's for % as
effective as Viagra It's Got Fabulous
attributes Alzheimer's prenatal uh birth
defects I mean on and on all of that is
on our website and we continue with our
scientific research but there's only so
much you can say in
advertising uh but when you see that
little bottle with a noose around its
neck that's cut and it says cheat death
you really empathize with the bottle and
with all of the attributes or for every
Young young word it has a hula hoop that
it's uh trying to keep up or whatever um
and the personality of the brand is kind
of sassy but Charming it's your friend
